item.title: 8 Fallacies of Distributed Computingüö´
item.description: “Mom! I read yet another random research paper that showed up on my Linkedin feed” So I was scrolling through my Linkedin feed when I came across yet another post by a wanna be tech influencer. Although this time the post was much better than those senseless, out-of-context content with an asthetic selfieü§°. The post recommended few interesting papers to read, so I read one of them and here I summarise it.
